alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 9:37PM CDT until June 12 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Western Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 937 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ozark, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Newville, Bells Crossroads, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Edwin, Scottsboro Crossroads, Snells Crossroads, Graball, Headland Municipal A/P, Dancey, Balkum, Skipperville, Echo, Blackwood, Capps, Roberts Crossroads, Barefield Crossroads and Murphy Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
